name: Pirate Captain
flavor: A charismatic sea dog with an impressive hat, eager to raid and plunder.

features.name: Swashbuckler - Passive
features.desc: When the Captain marks 2 or fewer HP from an attack within Melee range, the attacker must mark a Stress.

features.name: Reinforcements - Action
features.desc: Once per scene, mark a Stress to summon a Pirate Raiders Horde, which appears at Far range.

features.name: No Quarter - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to choose a target who has three or more Pirates within Melee range of them. The Captain leads the Pirates in hurling threats and promises of a watery grave. The target must make a Presence Reaction Roll. On a failure, the target marks 1d4+1 Stress. On a success, they must mark a Stress.

features.name: Momentum - Reaction
features.desc: When the Captain makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.
